Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/significant delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Jefferson Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with significant delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Jefferson Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Harlem (O'Hare Branch) to Addison in both directions and will conclude at 03:30 a.m.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
